channel.title: To Do on Ben Forgot
channel.description: Recent content in To Do on Ben Forgot

item.title: First post!
item.author: bensforgotten@gmail.com (Ben Forgot)
item.description: I need a place to collect my thoughts, memories, photos, and other media. I’m naturally forgetful, and much has been lost already. Writing things down sometimes helps me take a different perspective, as I write, and edit, and rewrite, and edit, and so on. Not looking to be monetized or have anyone look at advertisements, so this is built in Hugo, hosted on Netlify, and deployed from a repo on Github.
